connector.description: Receive data from an Ceph Bucket, managed by a Object Storage Gateway.

camel.kamelet.ceph-source.deleteAfterRea.name: camel.kamelet.ceph-source.deleteAfterRead
camel.kamelet.ceph-source.deleteAfterRea.description: Specifies to delete objects after consuming them.

camel.kamelet.ceph-source.autoCreateBuck.name: camel.kamelet.ceph-source.autoCreateBucket
camel.kamelet.ceph-source.autoCreateBuck.description: Specifies to automatically create the bucket.

camel.kamelet.ceph-source.includeBody.name: camel.kamelet.ceph-source.includeBody
camel.kamelet.ceph-source.includeBody.description: If true, the exchange is consumed and put into the body and closed. If false, the Object stream is put raw into the body and the headers are set with the object metadata.

camel.kamelet.ceph-source.prefix.name: camel.kamelet.ceph-source.prefix
camel.kamelet.ceph-source.prefix.description: The bucket prefix to consider while searching. Example: folder/

camel.kamelet.ceph-source.ignoreBody.name: camel.kamelet.ceph-source.ignoreBody
camel.kamelet.ceph-source.ignoreBody.description: If true, the Object body is ignored. Setting this to true overrides any behavior defined by the `includeBody` option. If false, the object is put in the body.

camel.kamelet.ceph-source.cephUrl.name: camel.kamelet.ceph-source.cephUrl
camel.kamelet.ceph-source.cephUrl.description: Set the Ceph Object Storage Address Url. Example: http://ceph-storage-address.com

camel.kamelet.ceph-source.delay.name: camel.kamelet.ceph-source.delay
camel.kamelet.ceph-source.delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll of the selected bucket.
